website_summaries.verdict: A steamer set that looks as good as it performs, and can withstand extreme cooking temperatures.
pros: A beautiful and well-made steamer set made of stainless steel with a high-polish finish
Can withstand temperatures up to 600º F, and can be used in the oven and broiler as well as on an induction cooktop
cons: Some owners of older All-Clad cookware say that the metal seems thinner on this newer model

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Not the quality I’ve come to know as all-clad... Thin metal. Hard to clean. Pot discolored after 1st week of use. Not at all like all the other pots I own. We have All-Clad at both our homes. I would not buy this again. Not without seeing it first...
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: This steamer is my favorite pot for corn on the cob. Hold 6 to 7 ears of Amish corn.
customer_reviews.text: All-clad pots and pans have always been my favorite. I've read reviews that this pot is cheap. Not so! I bought this pot to steam corn on the cob. It's heavy duty and does a great job. Steamed corn has never been better. I can steam 14 large eggs in this pot for hard boiled eggs or deviled eggs.I I can steam my veggies and my potatoes for family gatherings. Great but and I use this pot all the time. As for cleaning, very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Rubble

customer_reviews.title: Stained steamer.
customer_reviews.text: My first order got lost and amazon replaced it right away which is really great. I bought this so i could make food for my baby. This steamer would be really awesome if it doesn’t stain after being used twice. First time we used it the bottom pot had calcium stain then the second time the veggies left a stain. Not happy bout that. ***update*** I read somewhere to clean it with vinegar and all the stains went away! Happy now!
customer_reviews.author: maria a

customer_reviews.title: Fair Price and Multi Function
customer_reviews.text: This pot is good for steaming! I love it! It was way cheaper than the one I bought from Woll. You can also boil food in the pot. Big enough for 3 people! The only problem is it keeps growing some white spots! I am not sure if this was caused by the water or it is the quality issue of the steamer itself!
customer_reviews.author: bell.labs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. I use it for everything
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I use it for everything, from steaming vegetables to steaming chicken and beef. It is my go-to kitchen product--I even make soups with it. Definitely recommended. I started off with a small steamer. Once steaming food became a common cooking method, I moved onto this larger steamer and it saves a lot of time and I can put so much more in it.
customer_reviews.author: carmen

customer_reviews.title: Great steamer
customer_reviews.text: I use this only for steaming. It works perfectly. I particularly like that the bottom of the insert is not too close to the bottom of the outside pot. I can use deeper water inside to make sure it won't boil dry. The insert is roomy enough to hold a lot of food. So far I haven't had any problem with food dropping through the holes. In fact, I haven't had any problems with it at all. I've had it awhile, and the exterior finish still looks as nice as it did when I got it. The handles are sturdy and attached securely. I can't think of a single criticism.
customer_reviews.author: Weazy

customer_reviews.title: Best Steamer!
customer_reviews.text: All-Clad is the best in quality and design! It works well on my induction stovetop. I've used the steamer portion as a collander, pasta cooker, to strain the chicken and veggies from a soup stock. The pot can be used without the basket, making it versitile. The lid and steamer basket fit well. It's not too heavy, cleans well and has a lovely finish. The handles stay cool enough to handle. Best steamer design I've ever owned in 30 plus years of cooking!
customer_reviews.author: LKCampbell

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I expected. Very pleased with this steamer.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy I bought this. I steam broccoli all the time. Fits 3 lbs perfectly. Little staining at the bottom inside but nothing I can’t live with. I’m sure there’s a way to remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Carianne Desmarais

customer_reviews.title: Excellent steamer.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent steamer... wish the bottom had a a stainless steel coating to prevent calcium deposits from forming after steaming food. I have to constantly use Bon Ami to keep bottom clean...
customer_reviews.author: V Golden

customer_reviews.title: Love All Clad
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this steamer. I use it all the time. It's wide enough to steam a lot of veggies at one time and I use the pot to make soup and stews and boil pasta. Perfect for everything. The quality of All Clad is far and above anything else I've ever owned. This is my 4th All Clad pan.
customer_reviews.author: J. hammer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice steamer. The bottom pot gets easily discolored from ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice steamer. The bottom pot gets easily discolored from the boiling water though. I don't use it for anything other than steaming things so that's not super important to me, but it would bug me if I wanted to use the bottom part to cook soup or something in. I really like it as a steamer but probably wouldn't use it for anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It’s not the quality of regular all clad but it’s not at that price point either. That being said it performs very well. It’s an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Jane K. Greenwald

customer_reviews.title: All-Clad = Awesome sauce!!
customer_reviews.text: All-Clad is my favorite and this steamer is fantastic. My only wish is that I could have found it with a copper core.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Reed

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. Perfect for preparing family size meals.
customer_reviews.author: mamabear

customer_reviews.title: Great size for a large head of cauliflower
customer_reviews.text: Great size for a large head of cauliflower, large bunch of green beans, and 2-3 broccoli heads. The colander works well as is too. The price and quality here beats what was in stores near me (BBB, Costco).
customer_reviews.author: Emily K

customer_reviews.title: another great pan from all-clad
customer_reviews.text: I have several pieces of all-clad and use at least one or two of them daily. While this steamer does exactly what I purchased it for, I would not be happy using it for most other things. Why? The triple-layer is only on the bottom, not wrapping the sides like their other pots. I now wish I had purchased their steamer insert that fits 6/8/12 quart stockpots instead.
customer_reviews.author: Suze

customer_reviews.title: Thin metal
customer_reviews.text: Takes forever to boil water. worst All Clad pan on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I'm not very happy with the purchase. The pan is poorly cleaned. I do not recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Nichiporenko

customer_reviews.title: You can use it for anything but it does steamed veggies perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: We use it for steaming vegetables most often. But as other things come up we will use it. This is the third All Clad we have. The heat transfer through the pot is excellent creating an even heat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: now my favorite pot
customer_reviews.text: This size works well for so many meals including steaming and boiling.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Mills

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday pan
customer_reviews.text: I m an All-Clad fan and I am so pleased with this pan. I use it several times a week. It looks beautiful and cooks great. Wonderful soup pot. The price was outstanding. Would recommend this pan to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Bench Sarah Wells

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were expecting
customer_reviews.text: I will but anything All-Clad wants to sell me after checking out the quality on this. We have used it now for almost a year and are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Brent Yocum

customer_reviews.title: Very happy...& healthy
customer_reviews.text: So glad I made the switch & investment! Great pans!! Cook evenly & well. Clean up easy & no carcinogens released :)
customer_reviews.author: The Golden Life

customer_reviews.title: makes steaming veggies so easy. One of my new favorites in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: livedI don't know how I lived without this baby. makes steaming veggies so easy. One of my new favorites in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: PBFITZ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like every all clad product. Use this one in restaurant
customer_reviews.author: DGR

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Great steamer! I initially was disconcerted at how big this steamer is, but I now love it. It has the excellent construction you would expect from an All-Clad. The large area of the steamer inset steams vegetables very evenly, and I would never go back to my smaller steamer (I am cooking for two). And, the pot without the insert is an excellent size for cooking, say, a smaller package of pasta.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great steamer a we use it everyday to steam our veggies.
customer_reviews.author: The Douglass Family

customer_reviews.title: A high quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this. High quality and beautiful. It lives up to it's hype.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis J. Price

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best steamer I’ve ever owned! Love it and would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: kim birdsall

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: I use my steamer at least twice a week. It's as beautiful as the day I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: After the first use- of just boiling water, it left white spots on the bottom of the pan.
customer_reviews.author: K Brown

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Does exactly what we expected
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Does exactly what we expected. Great size and durability.
customer_reviews.author: joel m pasowicz

customer_reviews.title: Love this steamer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this steamer. It is of excellent quality at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Janice  E Nichols

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Absolutely beautiful and well made, of course ... it's ALL-CLAD! But the price was unbelievable. I went to Marshalls and found a 2 QT Saucepan for the same price I paid for this beautiful pot and steamer combined. I love it. I am a happy customer. It arrived sooner than I expected, and very well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Great Size with Many Options
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as Christmas gift for my daughter-in-law. She has other All-Clad cookware and this size just fit the niche between a large pasta pot (which she does not have) and the smaller sauce pots and pans--with the bonus of the steamer insert. Great quality pot that offers many options! She loves it and I'm pleased to have given her this great addition to her cookware collection!
customer_reviews.author: magilove223

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This item is what I hoped it would be. Heavy Dufy and easy to clean. I would really love to get the complete set
customer_reviews.author: Maria Rice

customer_reviews.title: An Absolute Beauty!!
customer_reviews.text: This is everything I hoped for, and more! With function and beauty combined, it has become the highlight of my kitchen. Well worth the investment! Be prepared to fall in love with it!
customer_reviews.author: Janis Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best steamer pot ever! All Claid is great, you won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Steamy Excellent All-Clad
customer_reviews.text: Perfect steamer for all vegetables. Can use as small pasta pot for single serve too! Excellent American made product!
customer_reviews.author: TAP1 New England

customer_reviews.title: All Clad is the best.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, it's All Clad. They make the best pots and pans. Roomy and the two handles on the steamer insert are convenient.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: love this! not only a great steamer, but also a great pot!
customer_reviews.author: NancyL

customer_reviews.title: ... par with all of my other all clad - great pot!
customer_reviews.text: So far the quality is on par with all of my other all clad - great pot!
customer_reviews.author: KBD87

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been steaming shrimp regularly since my new steamer arrived! I love it! Wish I had purchased it earlier!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Harris

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for. It's a large size, good quality and looks great. Great for steaming a large serving of potatoes.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce F.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Steamer
customer_reviews.text: Quickly done, best quality and healthy cooking without hassle. I would buy more of this brand. Previously I bought a strainer and am very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: maxine c sun

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking around for steamer for a long time, and finally I purchased this All-Clad steamer. the build quality is great, definitely worth the penny.
customer_reviews.author: Yu M.

customer_reviews.title: ... call me and they never did I am not pleased and I use amazon every month and deserve compensation ...
customer_reviews.text: I want my money back I bought 2 of these and both are rusting and I am afraid to cook in them but there is no way to contct amazon once I spoke to amazon and the man told me amazon would call me and they never did I am not pleased and I use amazon every month and deserve compensation I want repacements for a real all clad steamer pot not ones made in china
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Cook

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I needed a steamer pot to steam a larger amount of potatoes & veggies. I follow the Medical Medium diet plan which suggest cooked food be steamed to hold in the nutrients. First I bought a common folding steamer type basket. It just didn’t hold enough. This Al Clad steamer was pricey but it’s proved worth it. Well made & large, I can steam plenty of potatoes & veggies. It also holds plenty of water. Enough water to steam larger potatoes which take 40min. The lid is heavy & makes a nice seal. I’ve had it for 3months & use it almost everyday.
customer_reviews.author: J.H.

customer_reviews.title: Made In China
customer_reviews.text: The description of the item: "Today, All-Clad cookware is still handcrafted in Canonsburg, Pennsylvania, with American-made steel--the same way it was four decades ago." But this item is not handcrafted in Canonsburg, Pennsylvania. It is made in China. There is nowhere in the description that says so. The quality isn't there. I realize it's not as expensive as the made in USA cookware, but the reason why should be clear in the description. All-Clad should not wait for the customer to find out by wading through the reviews or by finding the small "Made In China" printed on the box, and the absence of "Handcrafted in the USA" on the bottom of the pan. I'm sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: CivilEyes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Steaming Veggies!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent steamer! Replaced old Revere Ware steamer that had plastic handled that were burned by the false of our stove top. The only very minor complaint about this one is it's HUGE! (Not exactly a problem — holds lots of veggies, even long asparagus, but it is more of a problem to get in the dishwasher and to store).
customer_reviews.author: R. D. Collins

customer_reviews.title: I have used the steamer three different times. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used the steamer three different times. I found small pits on the bottom of the pot. So I switched from using tap water to distilled water and the pits are gone. So mg tap water must have some impurities In it to cause that effect. So clean water or distilled water is the trick. Give it try...
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great size for cooking for two.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for steaming vegetable for one or two people. Heats up quickly and works with induction burners. Stainless steel is easy to clean. Very well made. Value is only 3 stars because of cost of pared to other steamers but it will last a lifetime. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shining rock

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I use this pot almost daily. Love it for steaming and making soups. I bought some bar keep to keep the appearance nice and a special towel for stainless steel. Super happy with this product I recommend it to everyone. It's now a staple in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this, easily one of my most used purchases. Constantly in use for 9 month old meals. Great size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cooks Evenly
customer_reviews.text: Also, steams quickly once the water/pot are heated. Base is very flat.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but small
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality that’s made in China, very durable, just a little small!

customer_reviews.title: poor performance
customer_reviews.text: it will take much longer to steam vegetables vs less expensive brand

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty pot and lid... worth the money
customer_reviews.text: heavy duty.... WIFE LOVES it....!! Not a flimsy pot! She loves on it evreytime she pulls it out or washes it or puts away... Bout to get jealous.. Haha As describes and A+ Seller
customer_reviews.author: Michael Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking pot.
customer_reviews.text: Returned it, didn't care for the shape of the pot or for the steamer basket. Would have preferred straight sides and just a soup pot with lid. It was very attractive, just not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy L.

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Have other all clad great products easy to use dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.author: Vannie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for steaming vegetables!
customer_reviews.text: This is a super steamer! I use it for steaming vegetables. It’s a nice family size pot and it cleans up in a snap.
customer_reviews.author: Simple Things

customer_reviews.title: This is a very pretty pot. My only complaint is that it is ...
customer_reviews.text: The size works just right for a lot of my cooking. This is a very pretty pot. My only complaint is that it is difficult to keep the inside of the pot looking nice. After cooking in it, the inside has a motley look and any food residue is hard to remove.
customer_reviews.author: B.C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far as a braiser / dutch oven.
customer_reviews.text: Loving it so far, with a few roasts cubed and braised for stew. Haven't used the steamer insert yet.
customer_reviews.author: Fnorgby

customer_reviews.title: Happy Cooking
customer_reviews.text: Me and wife like to cook. We are picky when it comes to cookware; this one is really nice. Good weight, balance, heat distribution and solid construction. It will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Tool Man

customer_reviews.title: Simple to Use
customer_reviews.text: Product looks good, is simple to use and does the job
customer_reviews.author: Docger

customer_reviews.title: As with most All-Clad products this steamer has excellent construction and design
customer_reviews.text: As with most All-Clad products this steamer has excellent construction and design. We have used it for a variety of tasks including boiling pasta, steaming veggies and making soup. As a result of our purchase we were able to retire several old pots.
customer_reviews.author: AcuityMan

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy the way steamed vegetables taste.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. The only thing I would change is reducing the size of the holes for corn and other small vegetables like that.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Chadwell

customer_reviews.title: From the Farmer's Market to this steamer!
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a silicone insert in a pot and decided to try something larger. I love this pot. I have found that I am eating healthier, I'm trying new recipes and new veggies! I have thrown this in the dishwasher and washed by hand. It has come out great either way. (So, why hand wash, right?) I've had it only a few months, but have used it numerous times each week. It still looks great. Nice even heating (gas range). Only downside - I have to remember the handles get hot.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great steamer that can be used separately as a sauce pan.
customer_reviews.author: JNV

customer_reviews.title: A well-made steamer
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Gleaming stainless steel. Good for steaming for two and even six portions.
customer_reviews.author: CWTrooper

customer_reviews.title: Works very well & the quality of the steamer is excellent. Great product & worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: A bit on the expensive side but it is well worth the extra expense. Works very well & the quality of the steamer is excellent. Great product & worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Our "go-to" pot for daily use!
customer_reviews.text: We were trying to get rid of our non-,stick cookware and were searching for an all around pot so that we could reduce the amount of cookware we use. We love this pot and use it daily for all kinds of cooking, steaming veggies, stews, chili etc. It has become our go-to all in one pot for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Julianne Biggerstaff

customer_reviews.title: Typical All-Clad quality and appearance
customer_reviews.text: All-Clad makes nice cookware and this is no exception. The steamer is well sized (broccoli fits inside the basket) and I like the All-Clad bottom that conducts heat well.
customer_reviews.author: Tab

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This All-Clad Steamer is easy to use and and is a great addition to one's kitchen. I have found Al;-Clad products products to always be excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Real shopper

customer_reviews.title: Super quality.
customer_reviews.text: If you steam, you can't live without this. Super quality.
customer_reviews.author: PR

customer_reviews.title: the food taste so much better that the other one I had
customer_reviews.text: I never spent that much money for a steamer it is well worth it, the food taste so much better that the other one I had. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine Boutin

customer_reviews.title: many problems
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Large and shiny Cons: Bottom pot is overly heavy, due to a ridiculous unnecessary clunky base plate; metal is inferior quality as it gets a brown/gray staining which I believe is actually manganese and/ or nickel leaching out of the metal; the handles are horrible, uncomfortable and inadequate for such a heavy pot. Made in China. The bottom pot is only for boiling water and does not need to have a boat anchor glued to the bottom (probably needed to cheapen construction or perhaps as a counterweight to the top due to the nonfunctional curved shape). It looks nice when new, but daily use is unpleasant and metals are questionable. Better handles would be nice, if not essential.
customer_reviews.author: GVB

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: This All-Clad steamer replaces a 20+ year old cheap, thin and tiny steamer that was warped and hard to use. I finally broke down and spent $99 (yikes) for this new one. I'm not sorry, in the least. This is a good product, even though it is made in China (that was a little hard to swallow). It seems to be a quality product. On my first use, it did exactly what I needed it to do - steamed some carrots and green beans. The second time I used it to make a sausage ragu for baked ziti...perfect. No scorching, cleanup was a snap. It looks good nestled among my other All-Clad pots. It was a good buy. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: B. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this pot. The handles, the size and the quality. A wonderful addition to my collection...the one I use most often.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Trankle

product_meta.title: All-Clad E414S564 Stainless Steel Steamer Cookware, 5-Quart, Silver -
product_meta.description: An essential piece for health conscious cooks, this All-Clad Gourmet Accessories E414S564 5-Quart steamer quickly prepares fresh and flavorful dishes. Ideal for cooking a wide range of food such as vegetables, seafood or even Chinese dumplings, the steamer insert is perfect for creating healthy and flavorful meals. Even more, prominent side handles ensure a secure hold when transporting the pot from the sink to the stovetop or when lifting the insert. Combining high-quality craftsmanship and long-lasting performance, All-Clad’s Gourmet Accessories cookware offers a sleek polished exterior, warp-resistant strength, compatibility with all stovetops (including induction), and dishwasher-safe cleanup—perfect for everyday cooking and holiday entertaining alike.
feature_bullets: 5-Quart covered steamer pot with 4-Quart stainless-steel steamer basket – perfect for cooking vegetables, seafood or Chinese dumplings
Single-ply polished stainless-steel construction with thick aluminum warp-resistant base for fast, even heating
Highly polished 18/10 stainless-steel cooking surface offers superior stick resistance and easy maintenance, plus won’t react with food
More durable than traditional pots for a lifetime of use; stainless-steel lid; stainless-steel handles permanently secured with stainless-steel rivets
Capacity etched on the pot’s base; oven- and broiler-safe to 600 degrees F; induction compatible; dishwasher-safe; limited lifetime warranty

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars180 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
